title: Music Management System
description:
Client-Server System Development: Developed and deployed client-server system supporting an application to search songs, retrieve song information, and play music remotely. Implemented by Azure, Jersey, Tomcat, MySQL,and AndroidSDK.
Server Design: Applied design patterns of Strategy, Singleton, and Factory. Utilized MySQL database to store user information, songs, and song information. Developed a RESTful server using Jersey framework to retrieve client data and send XML responses.

title: Computer Animation Labs
description: Computer Animation: Utilized OpenGL with hard code in C++ in Visual Studio to demonstrate interpolation, hierarchy system, physical system, autonomous behavior system, and particle system.

title: PageMerger App
description:
App Development: Built Chrome extension improving readability by allowing users to merge multiple tabs.
ï‚·Coding: Wrote content, inter-page communication, pop-ups, and manifest in JavaScript, HTML, and JSON.

title: Summary Chrome Extension
description: Chrome Extension Development: Developed Chrome extension to display pop-up summaries of embedded links for preview before navigation to a website using AJAX and JQuery.

title: Film-Locator
description: Designed and built a website identifying production locations of film projects
